Игра топовое, нигде так не горело очко, как в этой игре. Пишу это чтобы получить ачивку, ну судите строго мой эпистолярный жанр.

I have a mostly hate and also some love relationship with this game. Is the catholic church or facebook of games these days. There are plenty of more fun or better suiting games that I would rather play with my friends.
  It is just that this is by far the easiest compromise to make with everybody so it gets the top spot and I play it a lot, because I could get one or two people on board to play this or that, but I wont get the other two, they would rather this or that but everybody can come to play this.
  It is a bad game. There is little game in this game! It is a sport! Its great at that! As it is grinding a lot to get slightly better so that the next time you pop out of a corner you are 9% more likely to get the kill.
  As with sport usually, getting a friend to join you on a workout can make it much more fun. Imagine having 5 friends working out together! I would say this is the way I would prefer gym. Its also the way I prefer CSGO. Doing it alone can be just as tedious and downright miserable as doing cardio.
  If you play it. Get some real friends and then it can be fun!
